With over 15 years of experience teaching in K-12 public schools, I have developed innovative teaching techniques that engage students and promote critical thinking. My expertise includes designing hands-on experiments, integrating technology into the curriculum, and fostering a collaborative learning environment. As a mentor, I can offer guidance on lesson planning, assessment strategies, and classroom management to help junior teachers excel in their profession.
